item.title: Microk8s, multi-usage Kubernetes
item.description: Microk8s is a framework designed to start a Kubernetes cluster. According to Canonical, which maintain the project, it is production ready, requires low maintenance and the Kubernetes cluster uses minimal resources. Microk8s is cross-platform and is available on Windows, Linux and macOS. One feature that is really cool is that it comes with a plugin system to enable some features in the cluster lovely easy. It also supports ARM if you want to run a Kubernetes cluster on Raspberry Pies.
